changeSet.author: rmemoria

insert.column: Suspects on treatment and without validation
diagnosisType=0 and state in (1, 2) and validationstate=0
Suspects on treatment, validated and with DST result recorded
diagnosisType=0 and state in (1,2) and validationstate=1 and (exists(select * from examdst where case_id=a.id) or exists(select * from examxpert where case_id=a.id))

changeSet.sql: insert into tags_case (case_id, tag_id) select a.id, (select max(id) from tag where p.workspace_id=tag.workspace_id and tag_name='Cases on treatment without validation') nv from tbcase a inner join patient p on p.id=a.patient_id and p.workspace_id=24 where state in (1,2) and validationstate=0

insert into tags_case (case_id, tag_id) select a.id, (select max(id) from tag where p.workspace_id=tag.workspace_id and tag_name='Suspects on treatment and without validation') nv from tbcase a inner join patient p on p.id=a.patient_id and p.workspace_id=24 where diagnosisType=0 and state in (1,2) and validationstate=0

insert into tags_case (case_id, tag_id) select a.id, (select max(id) from tag where p.workspace_id=tag.workspace_id and tag_name='Suspects on treatment, validated and with DST result recorded') nv from tbcase a inner join patient p on p.id=a.patient_id and p.workspace_id=24 where diagnosisType=0 and state in (1,2) and validationstate=1 and (exists(select * from examdst where case_id=a.id) or exists(select * from examxpert where case_id=a.id))

changeSet.author: rmemoria

insert.column: Cases without District Registration Number assigned
Cases with District Registration Number assigned manually by the user
a.registrationcode is not null and a.registrationcode <> '' and a.registrationcode not like 'TB%'
Cases with District Registration Number assigned automatically by the system

changeSet.sql: insert into tags_case (case_id, tag_id) select a.id, (select max(id) from tag where p.workspace_id=tag.workspace_id and tag_name='Cases without District Registration Number assigned') nv from tbcase a inner join patient p on p.id=a.patient_id and p.workspace_id=24 where (a.registrationcode is null or a.registrationcode = '')

insert into tags_case (case_id, tag_id) select a.id, (select max(id) from tag where p.workspace_id=tag.workspace_id and tag_name='Cases with District Registration Number assigned manually by the user') nv from tbcase a inner join patient p on p.id=a.patient_id and p.workspace_id=24 where a.registrationcode is not null and a.registrationcode <> '' and a.registrationcode not like 'TB%'

insert into tags_case (case_id, tag_id) select a.id, (select max(id) from tag where p.workspace_id=tag.workspace_id and tag_name='Cases with District Registration Number assigned automatically by the system') nv from tbcase a inner join patient p on p.id=a.patient_id and p.workspace_id=24 where a.validationstate=1 and a.registrationcode like 'TB%'
